body:
### Image-Scrolling Example
This is sample using parallax scrolling effect on images. I used Volkswagen Beetle images and there are 39 frames. When the window scrolls the car will go on the road. I used jQuery.scrollTo plugin and images animated scrolls to show of the background

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```


### Author
Eniz Gülek

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
name: Image-scrolling
tagline: A Sample used parallax scrolling effect
